item.title: Slithz Typer (v.1) - Typing Terror Script
item.dc:creator: @LordDrakiss LordDrakiss
item.description:
@LordDrakiss wrote:

.Stephan, way to troll, if you acknowledge that it’s your machine, then why insult the script ?

Here’s the scoop, this script is common, and it uses a slower method of the accepted way to
spam keys, but it does work, in fact it’s the ONLY way to do the script regardless of if you do
it this (longer less effective) way, or the sendkeys a-z way, if you don’t include bit mapping.

Including bitmapping would raise your score considerably, but only on a machine that could
actually handle finding every forward backward upsidedown upsidedown-backward image and
type the apropriet key in time to complete every level.

in the meantime your comment was rude and offbase, the program is perfectly fine for an early
coder working on their first scripts… try upping your processor, and your friendliness.

Drakiss

Read full topic

item.title: Slithz Typer (v.1) - Typing Terror Script
item.dc:creator: @Slithz Slithz
item.description:
@Slithz wrote:

SLITHZ TYPER (V.1)

This script will run through the ENTIRE Typing Terror Neopets game.
The game is found HERE
Please post any problems or comments here
Enjoy

[code]/////////////////////////////////////////////////////
// SLITHZ TYPER (V.1) //
// Typing Terror Script //
/////////////////////////////////////////////////////

///////////////////INFORMATION////////////////////////////////
//Start this script on the game menu //
//It will run throught the game (with the end boss) //
//Please report any bugs to Slithz at www.moparisthebest.com//
//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
program TTA;
procedure startup;
begin
WriteLn (’ Thank you for using Slithz Typer (V.1) ‘)
WriteLn (’ -----=:=----- ‘)
WriteLn (’ YOU HAVE 5 SECONDS TO SELECT THE GAME SCREEN’)
wait(5000)
clickmouse(92,177,true)
wait(1000)
clickmouse(108,68,true)
end;
procedure typingterror;
begin
repeat
sendkeys(‘q’); //To make the typing slower LOWER the wait times
wait(10); //To make it faster make the wait times HIGHER
sendkeys(‘w’);
wait(10); //////EXAMPLES//////
sendkeys(‘e’); //FAST: wait(5) //
wait(10); //MEDIUM: wait(10)//
sendkeys(‘r’); //SLOW: wait (20) //
wait(10); ////////////////////
sendkeys(‘t’);
wait(10);
sendkeys(‘y’);
wait(10);
sendkeys(‘u’);
wait(10);
sendkeys(‘i’);
wait(10);
sendkeys(‘o’);
wait(10);
sendkeys(‘p’);
wait(10);
sendkeys(‘a’);
wait(10);
sendkeys(‘s’);
wait(10);
sendkeys(‘d’);
wait(10);
sendkeys(‘f’);
wait(10);
sendkeys(‘g’);
wait(10);
sendkeys(‘h’);
wait(10);
sendkeys(‘j’);
wait(10);
sendkeys(‘k’);
wait(10);
sendkeys(‘l’);
wait(10);
sendkeys(‘z’);
wait(10);
sendkeys(‘x’);
wait(10);
sendkeys(‘c’);
wait(10);
sendkeys(‘v’);
wait(10);
sendkeys(‘b’);
wait(10)
sendkeys(‘n’);
wait(10);
sendkeys(‘m’);
until(getcolor(305,276)=52224)
end;

procedure popups;
begin
clickmouse(305,276,true)
end;

begin
startup
wait(100)
repeat
typingterror
popups
until(getcolor(183,409)=4209722)
end.

[/code]
